headlines.description: — Tyler Herro had 31 points and eight rebounds as the Miami Heat rallied to beat the Detroit Pistons 100-92 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Herro leads Heat past Pistons 100-92 with 4th-quarter rally

events.name: Los Angeles Lakers at New York Knicks

headlines.description: — LeBron James couldn't be in the building. Anthony Davis almost wasn't.
headlines.shortLinkText: Knicks recover to beat Lakers team missing suspended James

events.name: Denver Nuggets at Portland Trail Blazers

headlines.description: — CJ McCollum scored 32 points and the Portland Trail Blazers handed the depleted Denver Nuggets their fifth straight loss, 119-100 on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: McCollum scores 32 as Blazers top skidding Nuggets 119-100

headlines.description: — It would have been understandable if the Dallas Mavericks folded in overtime against the Los Angeles Clippers after blowing a 10-point lead.
headlines.shortLinkText: Doncic returns, Mavericks beat Clippers in OT to snap skid
